General.Name: NH Foods Ltd
General.Description: NH Foods Ltd. manufactures and sells food in Japan and internationally. The company's Processed Foods Business division offers hams and sausages under the SCHAU ESSEN brand; and Chinese food meal kits under the Chuka Meisai brand; chilled pizzas under the Ishigama Kobo brand; and other meat products under the Hokkaido Carl Ramon and Kamakura Ham Tomioka brands. This segment also provides dairy products, such as cheese and yogurt products. Its Fresh Meats Business division is involved in the production and raising, slaughtering, processing, distribution, and sale of fresh meat products. The company's Overseas Business division produces and sells chicken, hams, sausages, processed meat, seafood, and vegetables. The company also exports its products. The company was formerly known as Nippon Meat Packers Inc. and changed its name to NH Foods Ltd. in June 2014. NH Foods Ltd. was founded in 1942 and is headquartered in Osaka, Japan.
